Class Enemy

public class Enemy extends Moving
A moving enemy which tracks the player constantly

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(gameWindow gameWin)
      Sets up the xGrid and yGrid position of the enemy. Also sets all of the images for the enemy.
      Parameters:
      gameWin - The gameWindow of the game

  • Method Details

    • isTouchedPlayer

      public boolean isTouchedPlayer()
      Gets the boolean value of touchedPlayer
      Returns:
      touchedPlayer

    • closestPosition

      public void closestPosition(int path)
      Update the position according to the moving direction with the shortest possible distance.
      Parameters:
      path - an integer value represents the moving direction with the shortest distance

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the position of the enemy to place itself closer to the enemy.

    • BFS

      public int BFS(int[][] grid, int xPos, int yPos)
      Uses a breadth first search to find the distance to the player
      Parameters:
      grid - 2D array of the gameMap
      xPos - XGrid position of the enemy
      yPos - YGrid position of the enemy
      Returns:
      int The shortest distance to reach the player

    • pathExists

      public int pathExists(int[][] matrix)
      Checks if a path exists and returns which direction to move for the shortest possible distance. (1 is up, 2 is down, 3 is left, 4 is right)
      Parameters:
      matrix - 2D array of the gameMap
      Returns:
      int Returns a value for which direction to move

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D graphic)
      Illustrates the enemy onto the screen
      Parameters:
      graphic - Used to draw onto the screen
